div.font:
Author: Siavash Taher Parvar
Last Update: 2024/01/24
Version: v1.0

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 655px; margin-left: 241px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

div.div: Reset & Clock Control

div.div: Power section has to be configured befoe the clock configuration

switch.text: Power section has to be configured be...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 143px; height: 1px; padding-top: 480px; margin-left: 340px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;

div.div:
Enabling Over-drive
1- Enable THE ODEN
2- Waiting for flag to state ready status (ODRDY bit)
3- ENabling the ODSWEN switch
4- Waitinf for ODSWRDY flag to be set

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2475px; margin-left: 241px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: GPIO

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 283px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2715px; margin-left: 270px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Pinout list
PA9 -> DMX_RXD (IN)
PA10 -> DMX_TXD (OUT)
PA15 -> I2S_WS (OUT)
PB5 -> I2S_SD (OUT)
PB3 -> I2S_CK (OUT)
PC4 -> I2S_MCK (OUT)
PA6 -> PAM8003_SHDN (OUT)
PA4 -> PAM8003_VOL (OUT)
PB15 -> PCM1754_DMP (OUT)
PB14 -> PCM1754_FMT (OUT)
PB13 -> PCM1754_MUTE (OUT)
PB7 -> TOSLINK (IN)
PB1 -> WS2812_BI (OUT)
PB0 -> WS2812_DIN (OUT)
PC9 -> OLED_RES (OUT)
PC8 -> OLED_DC (OUT)
PC7 -> OLED_I2C_SDA
PC6 -> OLED_I2C_SCK
PC0 -> EN_PWR (OUT)
PD2 -> IND_LED (OUT)
PA0 -> VAG_R (ADC)
PA1 -> VGA_G (ADC)
PA2 -> VGA_B (ADC)
PA3 -> VGA_HSYNC (TIMER CAPTURE)
PA5 -> VGA_VSYNC (TIMER CAPTURE)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 378px; height: 1px; padding-top: 3380px; margin-left: 252px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Init_GPIO(){
1. Set these pins as general output
PA6, PA4, PB15, PB14, PB13, PC9, PC8, PC0, PD2
2. Set these pins as alternatives for I2C
PC7, PC6
3. Set these pins as analog input
PA0, PA1, PA2
4. Set these pins as alternatives for I2S
PA15, PB5, PB3, PC45. Set these pins as alternatives for UART
PA9, PA106. Set these pins as alternatives for capture input timer TIM2_CH4 and TIM2_CH1
PA3 -> TIM2_CH4
PA5 -> TIM2_CH17. Set this pin as alternative function for SPDIF
PB78. Set these pins as alternative functions for TIM3_CH3 and TIM3_CH4 output compare
PB0 -> TIM3_CH3
PB1 -> TIM3_CH49. Set the output pins default value as follows
PA6 -> PAM8003_DEFAULT_VALUE_PIN_SHDN (TBD)
PA4 -> PAM8003_DEFAULT_VALUE_PIN_VOL (TBD)
PB15 -> PCM1754_DEFAULT_VALUE_PIN_DMP (TBD)
PB14 -> PCM1754_DEFAULT_VALUE_PIN_FMT (TBD)
PB13 -> PCM1754_DEFAULT_VALUE_PIN_MUTE (TBD)
PC9 -> SSD1306_DEFAULT_VALUE_PIN_RES (TBD)
PC8 -> SSD1306_DEFAULT_VALUE_PIN_DC (TBD)
PC0 -> PWR_EN_DEFAULT_VALUE_PIN (TBD)
PD2 -> LED_IND_DEFAULT_VALUE_PIN (0)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 378px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2975px; margin-left: 252px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Function List:
_init_GPIO()
GPIOWrite(pinName, pinValue)
GPIORead(pinName)
GPIOToggle(pinName)

div.div: I2C

div.div:
Function list:
_init_I2C()
I2CByteTx(addr, byte) - Private
I2CByteRx(addr) - Private
I2CDataTx(addr, data) - Public
I2CDataRx(addr, numOfBytes) - Public

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 4610px; margin-left: 282px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
_init_I2C( void )
{
Set the clock to 400KHz
Set the I2C in master mode
8Bits mode
Enable the proper interrupts
Enable the I2C}

div.div:
Timer 3 Functions list
_init_TIM3()
TIM3UpdateCompareValue()

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 5560px; margin-left: 282px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
_init_TIM3()
{
set TIM3 clock as 20MHz
set TIM3 mode as compare output
Connect the compare output to GPO CH3, CH4
Enable overflow and compare match interrupts
Set the counter register to 25
Set the compare register to 0
Set the output to be 1 before the match, and 0 after the match
}
